titles.title: A bill to amend the Historic Sites, Buildings, and Antiquities Act of 1935, and for other purposes.
An Act to provide financial assistance to Fort Abraham Lincoln and related structures located in Fort Lincoln State Park, Mandan, North Dakota, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 100-704.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources received executive comment from Interior Department. Unfavorable.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 100-366.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 699.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 9/16/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide financial assistance for the restoration and reconstruction of Fort Abraham Lincoln and related structures in Fort Lincoln State Park, Mandan, North Dakota.
